attributes.action: Change law so that only noiseless fireworks can be sold to help protect animals
attributes.background: We have a dog & he is petrified of the noise of fireworks.Its horrible to see him run & hide when fireworks go off.He shakes & is anxious & fearful of fireworks going off that he can't settle.Its not just our dog but everyone you speak to who has animals say the same it upsets & disturbs animals.
